page.title: 01A General Outline Of Area
page.content: Our area consists of a fairly flat piece of land with a little undulation to the west of Ratby where there is some pleasant woodland.In this area there is the remains of an iron age encampment. There are five settlements in our area.These are Kirby Muxloe,Ratby, Desford,Newtown Unthank and Botcheston.Of these we have only a section of each.We have most of Kirby Muxloe but unfortunately ,the castle, the focal point of the village,is just outside our area. There is not a great deal of employment in the area but there is aliitle light industry in Ratby.Most people travel to work in Leicester, although the offices of the county council are situated in a nearby village and provide some work for the area.
